borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p>a) No development shall commence on site, including any works of demolition, until a Construction Logistic Plan (CLP) that is in line with the TfL guidelines is submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The details shall include the numbers, size, and routes of construction vehicles, provisions within/around the site to ensure that all vehicles associated with the construction works are properly managed to prevent any unwanted disruption to other highway users, hoarding detail, pedestrian movements, skip placement, and other matters relating to traffic management to be agreed with the licencing officers of the council.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>b) Approved details under part a) shall be implemented throughout the project period and any changes to the document must be submitted to and agreed in writing with the local planning authority and their highway department.</p><p>&nbsp;</p>
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Construction of a new basement and alterations to the shop front

constraints_details.result: 284a Heathway, Dagenham, Barking And Dagenham, RM10 8QS
